release.change: NEW: Clicking the version number in the settings displays the full change log.
CHANGE: Add a new 'Auto expand' checkbox to the settings. This replaces the previous 'Auto content display' setting.
CHANGE: By default, links no longer expand when they have finished loading.

CHANGE: Free version no longer displays the notice about Link Bubble only handling links from a single app each time a link is loaded from a non-designated app. This prompt now only displays very rarely.
